column2: ENGLISH

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have a humble request for you in light of your debt to us. There is no rest in our defense against the infidels and we have desperate need of knights to lead our men. Thus, I would like to extend this opportunity to your able and noble [FromFrom.GetSonDaughter] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to serve in our ranks. Naturally, this would disinherit [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. May [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] bless you,\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3:
Très juste [Root.GetTitledFirstName], j'ai une humble requête à vous soumettre, qui a trait à votre dette envers l'Ordre.

Comme vous le savez, notre lutte contre les infidèles ne connaît aucun répit et nous avons grand besoin de chevaliers. Nous présentons donc l'opportunité à votre fils [FromFrom.GetFirstName] de servir dans nos rangs afin de rembourser votre emprunt. Notez cependant que cet engagement le déshériterait.

Grand Maître [From.GetFirstName]
column4: Rechtschaffenste[Root.GetrMale] [Root.GetTitledFirstName], ich habe eine bescheidende Bitte an euch angesichts eurer Schulden an uns. Unsere Verteidigung gegen die Ungläubigen hat keine Ruhe und wir brauchen dringend Ritter, um unsere Männer anzuführen. Ich möchte diese Gelegenheit daher nutzen, um euren fähigen und edlen Sohn [FromFrom.GetFirstName] anzufordern, um in unseren Reihen zu dienen. Natürlich würde dies ihn enterben. Möge [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] euch segnen,\n\nGroßmeister [From.GetFirstName]
column6: Just[Root.GetOA] [Root.GetTitleFirstName]. Quisiera haceros una humilde petición respecto a la deuda que tenéis que nosotros. La lucha contra el infiel no descansa y estamos muy necesitados de caballeros que dirijan a nuestros hombres. Así pues, me gustaría extender la invitación a servir en nuestras filas a vuestro a capaz y noble hijo [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. Por supuesto, esto le desheredaría. Que [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] os bendiga.\n\nGran Maestre [From.GetFirstName]

column2:
To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by devoting the life of your [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName] to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
[Root.Get_Au_TitledName],
Nous avons pris note de votre plaidoyer véhément pour le pardon et Nous sommes certain que vous aurez hâte de prouver la sincérité de votre repentance en vouant la vie d'un de vos enfants [From.Get_au_HighGod].

Cordialement,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
An [Root.GetTitledName],
Wir haben eure leidenschaftliche Bitte um Vergebung zur Kenntnis genommen und sind sicher, dass ihr die Aufrichtigkeit eurer Reue beweisen werdet, indem ihr eines eurer Kinder dem Leben von [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] widmet.

Hochachtungsvoll,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
A [Root.GetTitledName], 
Hemos escuchado tu apasionada petición de perdón y Nos estamos seguros que desearás mostrar la sinceridad de tu arrepentimiento dedicando la vida de uno de tus hijos a [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Atentamente, 
[From.GetTitledName]

column2:
To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by devoting the life of your [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName] to defence of the [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] as a member of.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

Naturally, this would disinherit [From.GetHerHim]. For Science!\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]

With anger and sadness,

Warchief [From.GetFirstName]

My liege, the Knights of Peter Claver stand ready to serve you in defense of Christianity and the Holy Land! Pax Christi,\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]

column2: Expel the Order of Our Lady Liberty
I can drive the Order of Our Lady Liberty from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...

I can donate money to the Order of Our Lady Liberty in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the judicary.

In exchange for dominion over the [c_palisades.GetName], the Order of Our Lady Liberty is willing to become my vassal.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the Order of Our Lady Liberty.

Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in our quest to serve the will of Lady Liberty! You have my friendship, as well as that of the judicary.

May Lady Liberty watch over you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order of Our Lady Liberty is in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

May Lady Liberty watch over you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The Order of Our Lady Liberty has constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Order of Our Lady Liberty serve at the pleasure of the Lady, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Airmen
The Airmen Assemble

Having been driven from their lands by [airmen_destroyer.GetBestName], the [Root.Religion.GetName] Texan Airmen, led by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty refused to scatter to the wind. Instead, they have rallied around [Root.GetBestName], who has pledged their service to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and all patriotic [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful. In time, they hope to return to their rightful territory - but for now, they seem to be content to carry out the will of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] with fire and sword.

column2: Vassalize the St. Ursula's Chosen
column6: Convierte en tus vasallos a los Caballeros teutónicos

column2: As a long-standing ally of the St. Ursula's Chosen, they could be convinced to become vassals of the realm if they see us fit.
column3: Puisque nous sommes un allié de longue date des Chevaliers teutoniques, nous pourrions peut-être les convaincre de devenir nos vassaux.
column4: Als langjährige Verbündete des Deutschen Ordens könnten sie davon überzeugt werden Vasallen des Reiches zu werden.
column6: Como aliados fieles de los Caballeros teutónicos, podríamos convencerlos de convertirse en vasallos del reino si nos ven dignos

column2: Hire an Ursuline Honor Guard
column6: Contrata una guardia de honor de caballeros teutónicos

column2: As a long-standing ally of the St. Ursula's Chosen, we can hire a part of the Order as honor guards temporarily.
column3: Puisque nous sommes un allié de longue date des Chevaliers teutoniques, nous pouvons engager temporairement une partie de l'Ordre en tant que gardes d'honneur.
column4: Als langjährige Verbündete des Deutschen Ordens können wir vorübergehend einen Teil ihrer Ehrengarde anheuern.
column6: Como aliados fieles de los Caballeros teutónicos, podemos contratar temporalmente una parte de la orden como guardia de honor.

column2: Knights of St. John
Hospitaller
Knights of St. Lazarus
Lazarian
The Knights of St. John

In these turbulent times the Pope in New Rome has decided to revive an ancient brotherhood established in the time of first crusades. An antediluvian organization has been hereby re-established and will now take up the sword for the defense of Christendom once again.
Pro Fide Pro Utilitate Hominum.
We will be wary in the future.
They're no use to us.
The Knights of St. Lazarus

In these turbulent times the Pope in New Rome has decided to revive an ancient brotherhood established in the time of the early crusades. An antediluvian organization has been hereby re-established and will now take up the sword for the defense of Christendom once again.
Atavis et armis.
We will be wary in the future.
They're no use to us.

There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

Pax Christi,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The Knights of St. John have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Knights of St. John serve Christ, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Expelled the Knights of St. John

I can drive the Knights of St. Lazarus from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Knights of St. Lazarus in their struggle against the infidels, even though this will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim].
